channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Quordle’ Hints And Answers For Thursday, August 21
item.description: Looking for some help with today’s Quordle words? Some hints and the answers are right here to give you a hand.

item.title: The Billion-Dollar Company Of One Is Coming Faster Than You Think
item.description: The first AI-powered billion-dollar solo startup is coming by 2028 driven by AI agents, no-code tools, and global digital distribution

item.title: The Creepy Butler: Metrics, Stories And Theories At AI 2027
item.description: Robots as butlers seem useful, but by 2027, fast AIs may lie, scheme, and fuel global power struggles, warns the AI Futures Project.

item.title: When An Enterprise Knowledge Graph Plan Comes Together
item.description: o9 Solutions' name expresses the continuous push to higher business optimization "o" and 9 because we can never reach perfection (i.e level 10)
